The key breaks in your hand
The lore-master Humfrey Rumming has posed a second riddle, insisting that if you solve this one, he will tell you what he knows.
The key breaks in your hand
The key breaks in your hand
The key breaks in your hand
The key breaks in your hand
The key breaks in your hand
The key breaks in your hand

'Bah! That riddle was too easy. Even a child could solve it!\n\n'Well anyway, the point is, Humfrey Rumming's secrets are not for you! You have no conception of the magnitude of my wisdom! The terrible secret of the salamanders is not for your ears!'

Humfrey Rumming is by the ruins of Tollobel on Tyl Ruinen.\n\nYou have obtained the token of the Warg from a chest on Tyl Ruinen. Bring it back to Humfrey Rumming if you believe it is the solution to his riddle.
'Can't figure it out, eh? I knew that first riddle was just a lucky guess! Look for the chests that I've hidden around Tyl Ruinen -- only one of them correctly solves my riddle!'
'Ha! I knew you would fail!'
Solve Humfrey Rumming's riddle
Bring token of the Warg to Humfrey Rumming
Rumming's Resolute Resolve
